column1: Smoque BBQ////The only reason I took off a star is that we got there at 5:30pm and it took over an hour to get our food.  We knew this going in
column2: and were not surprised or miffed by the wait
column3: but if the weather had been crappy or if we had come later and had to wait longer
column4: this wouldn't have been as good of an experience.  Next time we will call ahead and do carry out.  Yum!
